replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content: 先找能生成村庄的地形

replies.author: 下秒の记忆
replies.txt_content:
平原
沙漠
两个比较容易找到

replies.author: wadang
replies.txt_content: 也许，你可以写一段程序，记录下家，哈哈哈

replies.author: 流弊
replies.txt_content:
去草原
热带草原
沙漠
然后
/ gamemode 1
满图乱跑就行了~
